name: imgix Image
description: An image component, powered by imgix

attribute_definitions.name: URL to Link To
attribute_definitions.description: If this value is set, clicking on the image will redirect the user to this page.

attribute_definitions.name: Alt Text
attribute_definitions.description: The image alt text shown by the component.

attribute_definitions.name: Sizes attribute
attribute_definitions.description: The sizes attribute for the image to help the image behave responsively. If the image is a fixed size, set this to the image width.

attribute_definitions.name: Width
attribute_definitions.description: The width of the image in pixels. If set, will make the image render at fixed-size, making sizes have no effect

attribute_definitions.name: Height
attribute_definitions.description: The height of the image in pixels. If set, will make the image render at fixed-size, making sizes have no effect

attribute_definitions.name: Format
attribute_definitions.description: The format to apply to the image. It is recommended to use the auto parameter to set format, by including 'format' in the setting below. If set, this will override auto-formatting. For more information, see: https://docs.imgix.com/apis/rendering/format

attribute_definitions.name: Auto
attribute_definitions.description: The automatic parameters to apply to the image. Values should be separated with a comma, e.g. 'format,compress'. Default recommended is 'format,compress'. For more information, see: https://docs.imgix.com/apis/rendering/auto/auto

attribute_definitions.name: Crop
attribute_definitions.description: The crop parameter to apply to the image. For more information, see: https://docs.imgix.com/apis/rendering/size/crop
